description:
With fully dimmable dual LEDs, this powerful light runs up to 500 hours (seriously). Foldable legs, a magnetic bottom and a tripod attachment mean you'll always have somewhere to hang or mount it. Running low on iPhone juice? No sweat – use the USB ports to charge phones or other divices.

  • Dimmable dual-sided LED
  • Folding legs
  • Multiple hanging and mounting options: hanger, bottom magnet, and a ¼-20 thread for tripod attachments
  • Built in 1A Type A USB port
  • LED charge indicator
  • Rechareable Li-NMC battery
name: Goal Zero Lighthouse Mini V2 Lantern
